patthana8.68:1.1_0: Narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.68:2.1_0: Nanarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.68:3.1_0: Narūpāvacarañca nanarūpāvacarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.68:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.
